version_description: Minor improvements and bug fixes

Thanks for using Audiobooks.com! To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. Every update includes improvements for reliability and speed, and fixes bugs throughout.

This update also introduces intelligent storage monitoring, which alerts you when you are running out of storage space on your device due to audiobook downloads.

Thanks for using Audiobooks.com! To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. Every update includes improvements for reliability and speed, and fixes bugs throughout.

This update also introduces a fresh new look for browsing! Genres are now displayed using larger visuals, and scrolling through sub-genres and book lists is improved due to a tile-styled interface.

Take control of your audiobooks library with the new Audiobooks.com Apple Watch app, a new iOS 10 compatible widget and 3D Touch features to quickly access your audiobooks.

Thanks for using Audiobooks.com! To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. Every update includes improvements for reliability and speed, and fixes bugs throughout.

This update also introduces a fresh new look for browsing! Genres are now displayed using larger visuals, and scrolling through sub-genres and book lists is improved due to a tile-styled interface.

Take control of your audiobooks library with the new Audiobooks.com Apple Watch app, a new iOS 10 compatible widget and 3D Touch features to quickly access your audiobooks.

Thanks for using Audiobooks.com! To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. Every update includes improvements for reliability and speed, and fixes bugs throughout.

This update also introduces a fresh new look for browsing! Genres are now displayed using larger visuals, and scrolling through sub-genres and book lists is improved due to a tile-styled interface.

Take control of your audiobooks library with the new Audiobooks.com Apple Watch app, a new iOS 10 compatible widget and 3D Touch features to quickly access your audiobooks.

*Minor fix for audio quality issues experienced by a small amount of users.

Thanks for using Audiobooks.com! To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. This update introduces a Live Chat feature that enables users to message Customer Service Representatives with questions on everything from how to use the app, to what great audiobooks you should listen to next. This update also includes improvements for reliability and speed, and fixes bugs throughout.

Thanks for using Audiobooks.com! To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. This update introduces a Live Chat feature that enables users to message Customer Service Representatives with questions on everything from how to use the app, to what great audiobooks you should listen to next. This update also includes improvements for reliability and speed, and fixes bugs throughout.

Thanks for using Audiobooks.com! To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. This update introduces a My Recommendations tool to generate customized suggestions for your next listen. Simply navigate to the My Recommendations tab from the main menu, where the tool will prompt you to rate a selection of audiobooks, and then populate with recommendations it knows you'll love! Every update also includes improvements for reliability and speed, and fixes bugs throughout.

Thanks for using Audiobooks.com! To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. This update includes improvements for reliability and speed, and fixes bugs throughout.

Thanks for using Audiobooks.com! To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. This update includes:

- Bug fixes throughout
- NEW! Custom Seek Intervals: listeners can now enjoy the custom experience of skipping back or ahead in intervals of 10, 15, 30, 45, or 60 seconds. Access this new feature under Settings > Playback Settings.

Thanks for using Audiobooks.com! To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. This update includes a new sleep timer option to play an audiobook until the end of a track, as well as bug fixes throughout.
Thanks for using Audiobooks.com! To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. This update includes minor bug fixes.

Thanks for using Audiobooks.com! To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. This update introduces a new Member Deals section of the app, where subscribers can use their credits on high-value bundled content. This update also includes minor bug fixes.
Thanks for using Audiobooks.com! To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. This update includes minor bug fixes.
Thanks for using Audiobooks.com! To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. This update includes minor bug fixes.

To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. This update offers minor bug fixes, and the release of hot new titles including An American Marriage by Tayari Jones, Oprah’s latest Book Club selection!

To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. This update offers minor bug fixes, and the release of hot new titles including The Escape Artist by Brad Meltzer, Accidental Heroes by Danielle Steel, and Russian Roulette by David Corn!

To make your user experience better, we regularly bring updates to the App Store. This update offers minor bug fixes, and the release of hot new titles including A Higher Loyalty by James Comey, Crushing It! by Gary Vaynerchuk, and After Anna by Lisa Scottoline

Hot off the press! We’re always improving our app to guarantee you get the best audiobooks experience.
Next to some minor bug fixes, we’ve added these new titles to add to your must-read list: Warlight by Michael Ondaatje, Twisted Prey by John Sandford, and The Fallen by David Baldacci!

Like what you hear or could we do better? We always have an open ear to your feedback, so leave us a review!

Hot off the press! We’re always improving our app to guarantee you get the best audiobook experience.
Next to some minor bug fixes, we’ve added these new titles to add to your must-read list: The President Is Missing by Bill Clinton and James Patterson, The Perfect Couple by Elin Hilderbrand, and Something in the Water by Catherine Steadman
Like what you hear or could we do better? We always have an open ear to your feedback, so leave us a review!
This update contains our BRAND NEW podcast feature! Now, you have access to over 700,000 FREE podcasts! Make Audiobooks.com your go-to podcast player.
This update introduces features to make discovering new audiobooks easy, including the ability to follow authors, narrators and book series and get notified about new releases.
This update introduces the VIP Rewards Program for members and supports improvements to the Waze Audio Player, as well as minor bug fixes and improvements.

"Next to some minor bug fixes, this update includes popular titles to add to your must-read list, including Becoming by Michelle Obama, Where the Crawdads Sing by Delia Owens and The Reckoning by John Grisham."

Like what you hear or could we do better? We always have an open ear to your feedback, so leave us a review!

- The introduction of an Audio News section, where members can subscribe for daily updates from their favorite news organizations
- Minor bug fixes for an optimized user experience
